alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 2:03PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will be across southern Lyon County and along Highway 95 near Walker Lake.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, holiday decorations, and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
